title: Null pointer derefence due to bug in codegen with negation without using value
vulnerability_information:
Crash file is:

```
p *case
  when nil
    -0
    nil
end
```

```
$ ./dev/bin/mruby crash.rb
crash.rb:1:3: '*' interpreted as argument prefix
Segmentation fault: 11
```


Patch to fix is:

```
diff --git a/mrbgems/mruby-compiler/core/codegen.c b/mrbgems/mruby-compiler/core/codegen.c
index 553baa1..5ddf988 100644
--- a/mrbgems/mruby-compiler/core/codegen.c
+++ b/mrbgems/mruby-compiler/core/codegen.c
@@ -2256,7 +2256,7 @@ codegen(codegen_scope *s, node *tree, int val)
             }
             genop(s, co);
           }
-          push();
+          if (val) push();
         }
         break;
 
```

Hope that helps!

Cheers,

Hugh
